h4.CombatPowerStateSwitching_IsInState (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_CombatPowerStateSwitching_IsInState_GameServerLib]
*Returns: bool*
*Parameter 1: pChar (Character struct)*
*Parameter 2: pchState (string)*
Returns true if the given character has a CombatPowerState and is in the given state
an empty string "" is the same as the default state
